thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 10 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Presidio Q3 Earnings Per Share $0.01

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Presidio Q3 Earnings Per Share $0.01
text:
May 10 (Reuters) - Presidio Inc:
* PRESIDIO, INC. REPORTS THIRD QUARTER FISCAL 2018 RESULTS * Q3 REVENUE $665.1 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $699.2 MILLION
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.01 * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.28 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* QTRLY PRO FORMA DILUTED EPS $ 0.28 * FISCAL YEAR TOTAL REVENUE GROWTH IS EXPECTED TO BE IN LOW SINGLE-DIGIT RANGE
* FISCAL YEAR PRO FORMA DILUTED EPS IS EXPECTED TO GROW IN MID TO HIGH SINGLE-DIGIT RANGE
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.32, REVENUE VIEW $2.92 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
